summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 4096 for the improvement of West 54th Street from 6th Avenue Northwest to 8th Avenue Northwest; by constructing watermains and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 49232, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
